value.title: Connection Types in Power BI Import Data or Scheduled Refresh A Detailed Look Inside and Out
value.excerpt: Power BI is one of the BI tools in the market that supports more than one type of connection. Each connection type has pros and cons. value.title: Dynamic Banding or Grouping in Power BI   Using DAX Measures   Choose the Count of Bins
value.excerpt: Banding (or binning or grouping) is a scenario that can be implemented both statically and dynamically in Power BI.
